resources.string:
Here you can find all your favourite shoes. While we are 
 still improving our app, you can navigate in a very good and up to date shoe inventory. 
 Make the most of your day and order a new pair today! 
 To proceed to the instructions, click the "Take me to instructions!" button below.
How to use the shoe shop:

In the next screen you will be prompted to a list of \n shoes, which made up our inventory. You can scroll through the shoe list, or you can click to see details of a single product. \n To check the detail of a product, simply tap the image or the row that belongs to the item.
